message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your offer, I'm looking for a price closer to $18,000.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and bring significant value.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
